snippet.title: Xanthaphobia | Horror Game Awards February Showcase Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Xanthaphobia presents an immersive experience that blends elements of puzzles, mystery, and horror. The narrative unfolds as you return to your residence on March 18th, 1997, and make a spontaneous decision to embark on an exploratory adventure within an abandoned structure. 

As you delve deeper into the decaying edifice, an unexpected revelation emerges—a clandestine Government laboratory concealed beneath its timeworn facade, housing enigmatic relics of past experiments.

PLAY NOW - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2090310/Xanthaphobia/
---
The Horror Game Awards started towards the end of 2022 as a Horror Game of the Year Award set up by two die hard horror game fans. Fourteen content creators made up that year’s jury. It was such a success that in 2023 the jury doubled in size and the awards expanded their scope.

The aim of the awards is simple: to celebrate horror as one of the best genres in video games and to recognise the year’s greatest horror games alongside the developers who make them.

Website: https://thehorrorgameawards.com/
Merch: https://store.thehorrorgameawards.com/

Discord: https://discord.gg/j8wUUzJQ8D

Instagram: https://instagram.com/thehorrorgameawards
